artifactOfChoice:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
artifactOfChoice:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

artifactOfChoice:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
artifactOfChoice:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
artifactOfChoice:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

artifactOfChoice:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
artifactOfChoice:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

artifactOfChoice:DefaultAttackWithVariab.NAME: Special Strike
artifactOfChoice:DefaultAttackWithVariab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !artifactOfChoice:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

artifactOfChoice:DefaultSecondMagicNumbe.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
artifactOfChoice:DefaultSecondMagicNumbe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !artifactOfChoice:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
